title: Music Review: 'All Rise: A Joyful Elegy For Fats Waller'
teaser: One of the important thinkers in present-day jazz is taking his cue from the 1920's on his latest project. Pianist Jason Moran has released All Rise: A Joyful Elegy for Fats Waller.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
